Verses: 1 karththar Raajarigampannugiraar, Magaththuvaththai Anindhukondirukkiraar; Karththar Baraakkiramaththai Anindhu, Avar Adhaik Kachchaiyaagak Kattikkondirukkiraar; Aadhalaal Poochchakkaram Asaiyaadhapadi Nilaipetrirukkiradhu.
2 umadhu Singaasanam Poorvamudhal Urudhiyaanadhu; Neer Anaadhiyaayirukkireer.
3 karththaave, Nadhigal Ezhumbina; Nadhigal Iraichchalittu Ezhumbina; Nadhigal Alaithirandu Ezhumbina.
4 thiralaana Thanneergalin Iraichchalaippaarkkilum, Samuththiraththin Valumaiyaana Alaigalaippaarkkilum, Karththar Unnadhaththile Vallamaiyullavar.
5 umadhu Saatchigal Migavum Unmaiyullavaigal; Karththaave, Parisuththamaanadhu Niththiyanaalaaga Umadhu Aalayaththin Alangaaramaayirukkiradhu.
